title: Nutrition and Mental Health in Timor-Leste

questions.question: What is nutritional neuroscience?
choices: The study of how nutrients affect brain function and mental health
The study of how the brain processes information about food
The study of how mental health affects dietary choices
The study of neurological disorders caused by malnutrition
questions.answer: The study of how nutrients affect brain function and mental health

questions.question: Which of the following is a key nutrient for brain health?
What is a common nutritional deficiency in Timor-Leste that can impact brain health?
Which traditional Timorese food is rich in antioxidants and supports cognitive function?
What is a potential challenge in implementing dietary interventions for mental health in Timor-Leste?
choices: Overemphasis on mental health in public policy

questions.question: Which nutrient is crucial for the production of neurotransmitters that regulate mood and cognitive function?
What is a potential benefit of coconut in the Timorese diet for brain health?
choices: Provides medium-chain triglycerides that may enhance brain energy metabolism
questions.answer: Provides medium-chain triglycerides that may enhance brain energy metabolism

questions.question: Which micronutrient deficiency in Timor-Leste can lead to cognitive impairments and mood disorders?
What is a potential negative impact of the shift towards a Western-style diet in urban areas of Timor-Leste?
Which of the following is NOT a staple food in the traditional Timorese diet?
What role do antioxidants play in brain health?
choices: Protect brain cells from oxidative stress
Increase the production of stress hormones
Reduce the absorption of essential nutrients
questions.answer: Protect brain cells from oxidative stress

questions.question: Which nutrient deficiency is associated with fatigue, decreased attention span, and increased risk of depression?
What is a potential strategy for improving omega-3 fatty acid intake in Timor-Leste?
choices: Encouraging consumption of small fish eaten whole
Promoting the use of vegetable oils in cooking
Introducing more dairy products into the diet
questions.answer: Encouraging consumption of small fish eaten whole

questions.question: Which of the following is a challenge in the traditional Timorese diet regarding brain health?
choices: Excessive intake of omega-3 fatty acids

questions.question: What is the importance of B12 in relation to brain health?
choices: Crucial for the production of neurotransmitters
Primary source of energy for brain cells
Regulates blood flow to the brain
questions.answer: Crucial for the production of neurotransmitters

questions.question: Which of the following is a recommended approach for addressing nutrition and mental health in Timor-Leste?
choices: Educating the population about balanced diets for brain health
Completely replacing traditional foods with Western diets
Discouraging the consumption of local fruits and vegetables
questions.answer: Educating the population about balanced diets for brain health

questions.question: What is a potential benefit of promoting locally grown fruits and vegetables in Timor-Leste?
Which nutrient is important for maintaining myelin sheath integrity in the brain?
What is a potential consequence of vitamin A deficiency in Timor-Leste?
Which of the following is a good source of zinc in the Timorese diet?
What role does folate play in brain health?
Which of the following is a potential benefit of sweet potatoes in the Timorese diet for brain health?
choices: High content of omega-3 fatty acids

questions.question: What is a potential impact of food insecurity on mental health in Timor-Leste?
Which of the following is NOT a recommended strategy for improving brain health through nutrition in Timor-Leste?
choices: Eliminating all traditional foods from the diet
Promoting consumption of a variety of colorful fruits and vegetables
Encouraging intake of fish and seafood
Incorporating more legumes and nuts into meals
questions.answer: Eliminating all traditional foods from the diet

questions.question: What is the potential role of medium-chain triglycerides (MCTs) found in coconut for brain health?
Which nutrient is important for oxygen transport to the brain?
What is a potential benefit of mung beans in the Timorese diet for brain health?
choices: Good source of protein and B vitamins
questions.answer: Good source of protein and B vitamins

questions.question: Which of the following is a challenge in promoting brain-healthy diets in rural areas of Timor-Leste?
choices: Limited access to diverse food sources
Excessive intake of omega-3 fatty acids
questions.answer: Limited access to diverse food sources

questions.question: What is the potential impact of chronic malnutrition on brain development in Timorese children?
choices: Impaired cognitive development and reduced learning capacity
Enhanced memory function and improved concentration
questions.answer: Impaired cognitive development and reduced learning capacity

questions.question: Which of the following is a potential benefit of cassava leaves in the Timorese diet for brain health?
choices: High in protein and vitamin A
Rich source of omega-3 fatty acids
questions.answer: High in protein and vitamin A
